item.description:
Most of you have joined me at our Breakfast, Lunch or Evening Networking events! At the event I announced that I have a VERY Special Lady flying in to a Business Presentation on how she created such a wealth pattern. Now you want to be here for three reasons!

(1) I personally want you to meet her and here want she did. Million ayear for over 16 years in a row!!

(2) This is the circle influence you have been working for THIS is what networking is all about!

(3) Come and learn, surround yourself with folks who have done success and want to help others too!

 Please Do Not Just Show Up You Will Not Be Admitted!!!!

 If you RSVP, Yes, Please let me know ASAP if you have to cancel ASAP.

I have only 10 (TEN) seats , there will be a waiting list, If you respond by RSVP (waiting list too) I will call you to confirm, Now I know most of you said you wanted to attend but unfortunately I have limited seating. So act fast!

Anthony Pasquale
AJP Enterprise
A Mindful Wealth Group
Master Instructor

"Live with Purpose and Passion Everyday" ! 
 
OnlineMall
AJPwww.umachealth.com  
www.danversmartialarts.com

Ideal Business Center
20 Locust Street, Suite 100
Danvers MA 01923
(978) 836-6501

"It's remarkable, how much mediocrity we live with, surrounding ourselves with daily reminders that the average is acceptable. Our world suffers from terminal normality. Take a moment to access all the things around you that encourage you to remain "average". These are the things that keep you powerless, unable to go beyond a limit you have arbitrarily set for yourself."

Learn to shop and get paid for it!!!


Mindful Wealth Group
Get Paid to Shop
